findings.title: Unchecked Return Value
findings.description: The return value of a message call is not checked. Execution will resume even if the called contract throws an exception.

findings.title: Owner can airdrop tokens from another address
findings.description: The owner has the capability to airdrop tokens from an external address.

findings.title: Owner cannot burn tokens
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Owner cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The owner of the contract is restricted from minting tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Owner cannot block users
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to block users.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can update max transaction amount
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to modify the maximum allowed transaction amount.

findings.title: Authorized addresses collect BNB and tokens from contract
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to collect BNB and tokens directly from the smart contract.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can exclude/include addresses from dividends
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to include or exclude specific addresses from receiving dividends.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can exclude/include addresses from fees
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to include or exclude specific addresses from fees, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can exclude/include addresses from transaction limit
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to include or exclude specific addresses from the transaction limit, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can exclude/include addresses from cooldown
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to include or exclude specific addresses from the cooldown mechanism.

findings.title: Authorized Addresses Can Update Total Fees Up to 33%
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to update total fees up to a maximum of 33%.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change fee receivers address
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to modify the recipient of fees, potentially leading to unauthorized access and manipulation of funds.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can toggle swapping and update threshold amount
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to toggle swapping and update the threshold amount, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can update liquidity settings
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to modify liquidity settings within the smart contract.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can update distribution criteria
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to modify distribution criteria, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized Addresses Can Update Gas Distributor
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to update gas distributor up to 750,000.
